faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Answers to common questions about Samsung refrigerators

q1.question: How does Inverter technology work on Samsung refrigerators?
q1.answer: Digital Inverter technology helps flexibly adjust compressor speed according to cooling needs, saving up to 50% electricity, reducing noise, and extending compressor lifespan up to 21 years.

q2.question: Do Samsung refrigerators have SmartThings connectivity?
q2.answer: High-end refrigerator lines integrate SmartThings, allowing remote control via smartphone, notifications when the door is left open, and food status monitoring.

q3.question: What is Samsung's warranty policy?
q3.answer: Samsung refrigerators are covered by a 2-year full warranty, 10 years for Inverter compressor. Official warranty at over 1000+ service centers nationwide.

q4.question: Are Samsung refrigerators energy-efficient?
q4.answer: With Digital Inverter technology and energy-saving certification, Samsung refrigerators only consume 0.6-1.2 kWh/day, saving up to 50% compared to regular refrigerators.

q5.question: How to choose the right refrigerator capacity?
q5.answer: Family of 2-3: 150-250L | Family of 4-5: 300-400L | Family of 6+ or high freezing needs: 500L+. Choose a capacity 20% larger than current needs.

q6.question: What is Twin Cooling Plus technology?
q6.answer: Twin Cooling Plus uses 2 separate cooling systems for refrigerator and freezer compartments, maintaining optimal 70% humidity, preventing odor mixing, keeping food fresh twice as long.
